title: Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and Open Disclosure) Act 2023 (No.10 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and 

Open Disclosure) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited patient safety (notifiable incident open disclosure) act 2023 (commencement) order 2024

title: Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and Open Disclosure) Act 2023 (No.10 of
heading: 2. The 26th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 26th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and Open Disclosure) Act 2023 (No.10 of 
2023), other than section 68, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 September, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [482] 3
